verses.verse: Jesus,<WG2424> full<WG4134> of the Holy<WG40> Spirit,<WG4151> returned<WG5290> from<WG575> the Jordan,<WG2446> and<WG2532> was led<WG71> by<WG1722> the Spirit<WG4151> into<WG1519> the wilderness<WG2048>

for<WG3985> forty<WG5062> days,<WG2250> being<WG3985> tempted<WG3985> by<WG5259> the devil.<WG1228> He<WG2532> ate<WG5315> nothing<WG3756> <WG3762> in<WG1722> those<WG1565> days.<WG2250> Afterward,<WG2532> when they<WG846> were completed,<WG4931> he was hungry.<WG3983>
The<WG2532> devil<WG1228> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "If<WG1487> you are<WG1488> the Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> command<WG2036> this<WG5129> stone<WG3037> to<WG2443> become<WG1096> bread.<WG740>"

Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "It is written,<WG1125> <WG3754> <WG444> 'Man shall<WG2198> not<WG3756> live<WG2198> by<WG1909> bread<WG740> alone,<WG3441> but<WG235> by<WG1909> every<WG3956> word<WG4487> of God.<WG2316>'"

The devil,<WG1228> leading<WG321> him<WG846> up<WG321> on<WG1519> a<WG3735> high<WG5308> mountain,<WG3735> showed<WG1166> him<WG846> all<WG3956> the kingdoms<WG932> of the world<WG3625> in<WG1722> a moment<WG4743> of time.<WG5550>

The<WG2532> devil<WG1228> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "I will give<WG1325> you<WG4671> all<WG537> this<WG3778> authority,<WG1849> and<WG2532> their glory,<WG1391> for it<WG3754> has been delivered<WG3860> to me;<WG1698> and<WG2532> I give<WG1325> it<WG3739> to whomever<WG1437> I want.<WG2309>
If<WG1437> you<WG4771> therefore<WG3767> will worship<WG4352> before<WG1799> me,<WG3450> it will all<WG3956> be<WG2071> yours.<WG4675>"

Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> him,<WG846> "Get<WG5217> behind<WG3694> me<WG3450> Satan!<WG4567> For<WG1063> it is written,<WG1125> <WG4352> 'You shall worship the Lord<WG2962> your<WG4675> God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> you shall serve<WG3000> him<WG846> only.<WG3441>'"

He<WG2532> led<WG71> him<WG846> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2419> and<WG2532> set<WG2476> him<WG846> on<WG1909> the pinnacle<WG4419> of the temple,<WG2411> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "If<WG1487> you are<WG1488> the Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> cast<WG906> yourself<WG4572> down<WG2736> from here,<WG1782>
for<WG1063> it is written,<WG1125> <WG1781> 'He will put his<WG846> angels<WG32> in charge<WG1781> of<WG4012> you,<WG4675> to guard<WG1314> you;<WG3754>'
and,<WG2532> <WG1909> 'On their hands<WG5495> they will bear<WG142> you<WG4571> up,<WG142> lest perhaps<WG3379> you dash<WG4350> your<WG4675> foot<WG4228> against<WG4314> a stone.<WG3754>'"
Jesus<WG2424> answering,<WG611> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "It has been said,<WG2046> <WG1598> 'You shall not<WG3756> tempt<WG1598> the Lord<WG2962> your<WG4675> God.<WG3754>'"
When<WG4931> the devil<WG1228> had completed<WG4931> every<WG3956> temptation,<WG3986> he departed<WG868> from<WG575> him<WG846> until<WG891> another time.<WG2540>

Jesus<WG2424> returned<WG5290> in<WG1722> the power<WG1411> of the Spirit<WG4151> into<WG1519> Galilee,<WG1056> and<WG2532> news<WG5345> about<WG4012> him<WG846> spread<WG1831> through<WG2596> all<WG3650> the surrounding area.<WG4066>
He<WG846> taught<WG1321> in<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogues,<WG4864> being glorified<WG1392> by<WG5259> all.<WG3956>

He<WG2532> came<WG2064> to<WG1519> Nazareth,<WG3478> where<WG3757> he had been<WG2258> brought up.<WG5142> He<WG2532> entered,<WG1525> as<WG2596> was<WG1486> his<WG846> custom,<WG1519> into the synagogue<WG4864> on<WG1722> the Sabbath<WG4521> day,<WG2250> and<WG2532> stood up<WG450> to read.<WG314>

The<WG2532> book<WG975> of the prophet<WG4396> Isaiah<WG2268> was handed<WG1929> to him.<WG846> He opened<WG380> the book,<WG975> and<WG2532> found<WG2147> the place<WG5117> where<WG3757> it was<WG2258> written,<WG1125>

"The Spirit<WG4151> of the Lord<WG2962> is on<WG1909> me,<WG1691> because<WG1752> he has anointed<WG5548> me<WG3165> to preach good news<WG2097> to the poor.<WG4434> He has sent<WG649> me<WG3165> to heal<WG2390> the brokenhearted,<WG2588> to proclaim<WG2784> release<WG859> to the captives,<WG164> <WG2532> recovering of sight<WG309> to the blind,<WG5185> <WG649> to<WG1722> deliver<WG859> those who are crushed,<WG3739>
and to proclaim<WG2784> the acceptable<WG1184> year<WG1763> of the Lord.<WG2962>"

He<WG2532> closed<WG4428> the book,<WG975> gave<WG591> it back<WG591> to the attendant,<WG5257> and sat down.<WG2523> The<WG2532> eyes<WG3788> of all<WG3956> in<WG1722> the synagogue<WG4864> were<WG2258> fastened<WG816> on him.<WG846>
He<WG1161> began<WG756> to<WG4314> tell<WG3004> them,<WG846> "Today,<WG4594> this<WG3778> Scripture<WG1124> has been<WG4137> fulfilled<WG4137> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> hearing.<WG3775>"

All<WG3956> testified<WG3140> about<WG3140> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> wondered<WG2296> at<WG1909> the<WG3056> gracious<WG5485> words<WG3056> which<WG3588> proceeded<WG1607> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth,<WG4750> and<WG2532> they said,<WG3004> <WG2076> "Isn't<WG3756> this<WG3778> Joseph<WG2501>'s son?<WG5207>"

He<WG2532> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them,<WG846> "Doubtless<WG3843> you will<WG2046> tell<WG2046> me<WG3427> this<WG3778> parable,<WG3850> <WG2395> 'Physician, heal<WG2323> yourself!<WG4572> Whatever<WG3745> we have heard<WG191> done<WG1096> at<WG1722> Capernaum,<WG2584> do<WG4160> also<WG2532> here<WG5602> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> hometown.<WG3968>'"
He<WG1161> said,<WG2036> "Most certainly<WG281> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> no<WG3762> prophet<WG4396> is<WG2076> acceptable<WG1184> in<WG1722> his<WG846> hometown.<WG3968>

But<WG1161><WG99999> truly<WG225> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> there were<WG2258> many<WG4183> widows<WG5503> in<WG1722> Israel<WG2474> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of Elijah,<WG2243> when<WG3753> the sky<WG3772> was shut up<WG2808> three<WG5140> years<WG2094> and<WG2532> six<WG1803> months,<WG3376> when<WG5613> a<WG1909> great<WG3173> famine<WG3042> came<WG1096> over<WG1909> all<WG3956> the land.<WG1093>

<WG2532> Elijah<WG2243> was<WG3992> sent<WG1487> to<WG4314> none<WG3762> of them,<WG846> except<WG3361> to<WG1519> Zarephath,<WG4558> in the land of Sidon,<WG4605> to<WG4314> a woman<WG1135> who was a widow.<WG5503>

There<WG2532> were<WG2258> many<WG4183> lepers<WG3015> in<WG1722> Israel<WG2474> in the time<WG1909> of Elisha<WG1666> the prophet,<WG4396> yet<WG2532> not<WG3762> one of them<WG846> was cleansed,<WG1487> except<WG3361> Naaman,<WG3497> the Syrian.<WG4948>"
<WG2532> They<WG3956> were all filled<WG4130> with wrath<WG2372> in<WG1722> the synagogue,<WG4864> as they heard<WG191> these things.<WG5023>

They<WG2532> rose up,<WG450> threw<WG1544> him<WG846> out of<WG1854> the city,<WG4172> and<WG2532> led<WG71> him<WG846> to<WG2193> the brow<WG3790> of the hill<WG3735> that their<WG846> city<WG4172> was built<WG3618> on,<WG1909> that<WG1519> they might throw<WG2630> him<WG846> off the cliff.<WG3739>
But<WG1161> he,<WG846> passing<WG1330> through<WG1223> their<WG846> midst,<WG3319> went his way.<WG4198>
He<WG2532> came down<WG2718> to<WG1519> Capernaum,<WG2584> a city<WG4172> of Galilee.<WG1056> He<WG2532> was<WG2258> teaching<WG1321> them<WG846> on<WG1722> the Sabbath day,<WG4521>
and<WG2532> they were astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his<WG846> teaching,<WG1322> for<WG3754> his<WG846> word<WG3056> was<WG2258> with<WG1722> authority.<WG1849>
In<WG1722> the synagogue<WG4864> there was<WG2258> a man<WG444> who had<WG2192> a spirit<WG4151> of an unclean<WG169> demon,<WG1140> and<WG2532> he cried out<WG349> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456>

saying,<WG3004> "Ah!<WG5101> what have we to do<WG2254> with you,<WG4671> Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth?<WG3479> Have you come<WG2064> to destroy<WG622> us?<WG2248> I know<WG1492> you<WG4571> who<WG5101> you are:<WG1488> the Holy One<WG40> of God!<WG2316>"

Jesus<WG2424> rebuked<WG2008> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "Be silent,<WG5392> and<WG2532> come out<WG1831> of<WG1537> him!<WG846>" When<WG2532> the demon<WG1140> had thrown<WG4496> him<WG846> down in<WG1519> their midst,<WG3319> he came<WG1831> out of<WG575> him,<WG846> having done him<WG846> no<WG3367> harm.<WG984>

Amazement<WG2285> came<WG1096> on<WG1909> all,<WG3956> and<WG2532> they spoke<WG4814> together,<WG4314> one with another,<WG240> saying,<WG3004> "What<WG5101> is this<WG3778> word?<WG3056> For<WG3754> with<WG1722> authority<WG1849> and<WG2532> power<WG1411> he commands<WG2004> the unclean<WG169> spirits,<WG4151> and<WG2532> they come out!<WG1831>"
News<WG2279> about<WG4012> him<WG846> went out<WG1607> into<WG1519> every<WG3956> place<WG5117> of the surrounding region.<WG4066>

He<WG1161> rose<WG450> up<WG450> from the synagogue,<WG4864> and entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> Simon<WG4613>'s house.<WG3614> Simon<WG4613>'s mother-in<WG3994>-law was<WG2258> afflicted with<WG4912> a great<WG3173> fever,<WG4446> and<WG2532> they begged<WG2065> him<WG846> for<WG4012> her.<WG846>
He<WG2532> stood<WG2186> over<WG1883> her,<WG846> and rebuked<WG2008> the fever;<WG4446> and<WG2532> it left<WG863> her.<WG846> Immediately<WG3916> she rose<WG450> up and served<WG1247> them.<WG846>

When<WG1161> the sun<WG2246> was setting,<WG1416> all<WG3956> those who<WG3745> had<WG2192> any sick<WG770> with various<WG4164> diseases<WG3554> brought<WG71> them<WG846> to<WG4314> him;<WG846> and<WG1161> he laid<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> on every<WG1538> one<WG1520> of them,<WG846> and healed<WG2323> them.<WG846>

Demons<WG1140> also<WG2532> came out<WG1831> from<WG575> many,<WG4183> crying out,<WG2896> and<WG2532> saying,<WG3754> "You<WG4771> are<WG1488> the Christ,<WG5547> the Son<WG5207> of God!<WG2316>" Rebuking<WG2008> them,<WG3756> he didn't allow<WG1439> them<WG846> to speak,<WG2980> because<WG3754> they knew<WG1492> that he<WG846> was<WG1511> the Christ.<WG5547>

When<WG1161> it was<WG1096> day,<WG2250> he departed<WG1831> and went<WG4198> into<WG1519> an uninhabited<WG2048> place,<WG5117> and<WG2532> the multitudes<WG3793> looked<WG2212> for him,<WG846> and<WG2532> came<WG2064> to<WG2193> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> held<WG2722> on to him,<WG846> so that he wouldn't<WG3361> go away<WG4198> from<WG575> them.<WG846>

He<WG2532> was<WG2258> preaching<WG2784> in<WG1722> the synagogues<WG4864> of Galilee.<WG1056>
